knimeNode.name: File Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: File reader node for centroid Thermo RAW and PSI mzML mass spectrometry files.

fullDescription.intro:
The node iterates over a given directory and reads the containing files.
PSI's mzML and Thermo's RAW formats are supported as input formats. The File Reader node supports selection of whole directories and individual files. The file counter can be set to limit the number of files to be read in. Broken files which cannot be parsed get excluded. File names must be unique. See Supported File Formats for additional information.
fullDescription.option: A directory or file(s) to be read in.

ports.outPort: Table containing successfully loaded MS Data cells.
